title: Joelho-Alto Prejuizo Moral
description: Portuguese Gremlins. Small, horrifying monsters terrorize a village and only one man (and holy water) can stop them. Beware heat, salt, love, and rainbows.
quote: This is a creature of many mischiefs.
altHero: a green gremlin peeks out of a wooden box
alt1: an old bearded man with a pipe
alt2: a gremlin looks up from inside a soup pot
alt3: a gremlin in a church flails as he is touched by a rainbow
alt4: the old man is in the church wearing traditional clothing and wielding a gun
